| HistoryText             = Members of the Epsilon Flight are the armored security force of [[Department H (Earth-616)|Department H]].

There were two primary divisions: Epsilons and Epsilon Black.  
Epsilons performed general security duties and occasionally accompanied [[Alpha Flight (Earth-616)|Alpha Flight]] on missions.

Epsilon Black were rumored to be the "cleaners" of Department H; disposing of anyone who opposed the Department. They also served as bodyguards for [[Director X (Department H) (Earth-616)|Director X]].

| Equipment               = Protective body armour.
| Transportation          = Epsilon Flight had access to all the transportation devices of Department H.
| Weapons                 = Sonic guns that can stun opponents.
